name: Near Death Experience (itch) (DWooRY)
description: After you had a fatal accident, you opened your eyes to life again as a result of the critical interventions of the doctors. However, you feel that it is not the same as before. You have something different now. You discover this difference the first time you feel danger around you. Now you can pause time. Even if the cost of using this power you feel is to face death again and again, can you do it? Can you risk your own life to save others?
